title: Provided further that in non-residential building, where entire parking is proposed by mechanical/ automatic means, additional parking to the extent of 20% of the required parking shall be permitted free of FSI as vehicle holding area
clause_text: Provided further that in non-residential building, where entire parking is proposed by mechanical/ automatic means, additional parking to the extent of 20% of the required parking shall be permitted free of FSI as vehicle holding area. Area of one office room as provided in sub-Regulation (9) of Regulation 37
